trans-unit.source: Mechanism to Restore from an Alternate Server

seg-source.mrk: Mechanism to Restore from an Alternate Server

target.mrk: Mécanisme de restauration à partir d'un autre serveur

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to perform an alternate server restore. This can be useful in the following situations:

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to perform an alternate server restore.
This can be useful in the following situations:

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous permet d'effectuer une restauration de serveur de remplacement.
Ceci est utile dans les situations suivantes :

trans-unit.source: The server where you backed up your agent initially is no longer available, but a replica of the server exists.

seg-source.mrk: The server where you backed up your agent initially is no longer available, but a replica of the server exists.

target.mrk: Le serveur sur lequel vous avez initialement sauvegardé votre agent n'est plus disponible, mais une réplique du serveur existe.

trans-unit.source: You want to restore data backed up by another server, or files or folders using replicated data.

seg-source.mrk: You want to restore data backed up by another server, or files or folders using replicated data.

target.mrk: Vous souhaitez restaurer des données sauvegardées par un autre serveur, ou des fichiers ou des dossiers à l'aide de données répliquées.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram illustrates the mechanism (<MadCap:xref href="#alt_server_restore_mechanism" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>). In this example, Agent 1 sends a request via the Restore interface to replicated server B to restore its data.

seg-source.mrk: The following diagram illustrates the mechanism (<MadCap:xref href="#alt_server_restore_mechanism" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).
In this example, Agent 1 sends a request via the Restore interface to replicated server B to restore its data.

target.mrk: Le schéma suivant illustre ce mécanisme (<MadCap:xref href="#alt_server_restore_mechanism" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).
Dans cet exemple, l'agent 1 envoie une requête via l'interface de restauration au serveur B répliqué pour restaurer ses données.

trans-unit.source: Mechanism of an alternate server restore

seg-source.mrk: Mechanism of an alternate server restore

target.mrk: Mécanisme de restauration d'un autre serveur
